org.apache.ambari.server.agent.stomp

Class AgentHostDataHolder<T extends STOMPHostEvent & Hashable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.agent.stomp.AgentDataHolder<T>
      • org.apache.ambari.server.agent.stomp.AgentHostDataHolder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - event with hash to control version
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentConfigsHolder, AlertDefinitionsHolder, HostLevelParamsHolder

    public abstract class AgentHostDataHolder<T extends STOMPHostEvent & Hashable>
extends AgentDataHolder<T>
    Is used to saving and updating last version of event in host scope
